sys_openapi_operation.name: Create Image
sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation:
{"fName":"Create Image","fOperationId":"createImage","fDescription":"Creates a private gold-master Image from a Linode Disk. There is no additional charge to store Images for Linode users.
Images are limited to three per Account.
","fPath":"/images","fHttpMethod":"POST","fDeprecated":false,"fRequest":{"fDescription":"Information about the Image to create.","fRequired":false,"fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"requestapplicationjson1187855890","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":["disk_id"],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[{"fName":"id","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"The unique ID of this Image.","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":true,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"},{"fName":"label","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"A short description of the Image. Labels cannot contain special characters.
","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"},{"fName":"created","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"When this Image was created.","fFormat":"date-time","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":true,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"glide_date_time"},{"fName":"created_by","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"The name of the User who created this Image.

Will only be True for deprecated public Images.

Size is in MB.
","fFormat":"int32","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":true,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"integer"},{"fName":"type","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":["manual","automatic"],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"How the Image was created.
